name: Roll-A-Rainbow
overview:
This game challenges the players ability to roll the balls into the seven colorful target slots on the playfield. With each new color target they hit players win more tickets, but beware, the first time a player rolls a ball in a previously won slot, the game ends. Players that light all seven rainbow slots win the bonus.

Progressive bonus!

Link several Roll-A-Rainbow games together with our patented Progressive bonus display and give players a chance to win hundreds of tickets by lighting all seven rainbow colored targets!
